content:
Viralrecon - SARS-CoV-2 Genome Surveillance

Optimized bioinformatics pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 genome assembly, variant calling, and lineage assignment from COVID-19 patient samples. Supports both amplicon (e.g., ARTIC) and metagenomic protocols on Illumina and Nanopore platforms for comprehensive viral surveillance.

What is SARS-CoV-2 Surveillance?

Viralrecon enables real-time monitoring of SARS-CoV-2 evolution, tracking emerging variants of concern, and understanding transmission dynamics through high-quality genome sequencing and comprehensive variant analysis.

Key Features

  • ARTIC Protocol Support: Optimized for standard amplicon methods
  • Variant of Concern Detection: Identify Alpha, Delta, Omicron, etc.
  • Pangolin Lineage Assignment: Automated clade classification
  • Mutation Profiling: Track spike protein and other mutations
  • Quality Metrics: Coverage, completeness, variant frequency
  • Outbreak Tracking: Phylogenetic analysis ready outputs

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Quality Control: FastQC and sequencing metrics
  2. Primer Trimming: Remove amplicon primers (ARTIC, etc.)
  3. Read Mapping: Align to SARS-CoV-2 reference genome
  4. Variant Calling: Identify mutations with multiple callers
  5. Consensus Assembly: Generate complete viral genomes
  6. Lineage Assignment: Pangolin/Nextclade classification
  7. Mutation Annotation: Functional effect prediction
  8. Quality Reporting: MultiQC comprehensive summary

Scientific Applications

  • COVID-19 Surveillance: Monitor circulating variants
  • Outbreak Investigation: Track transmission clusters
  • Variant Emergence: Detect new mutations early
  • Public Health: Inform infection control measures
  • Clinical Diagnostics: Characterize patient viral loads
  • Vaccine Effectiveness: Monitor breakthrough infections

Variant Analysis

  • Spike Protein Mutations: Track immune escape variants
  • Lineage Classification: WHO nomenclature (Alpha, Beta, etc.)
  • Sub-lineages: Detailed BA.1, BA.2, etc. identification
  • Key Mutations: N501Y, E484K, L452R detection
  • Recombinant Detection: Identify chimeric genomes

Advantages

  • ARTIC Optimized: Works seamlessly with standard protocols
  • Up-to-date: Regular updates for new variants
  • Comprehensive: From reads to lineages
  • Quality Focused: Stringent QC metrics
  • Surveillance Ready: GISAID submission compatible

Input Requirements

  • FASTQ Files: Illumina or Nanopore COVID-19 sequencing
  • Sample Sheet: CSV with sample metadata
  • Protocol: Amplicon (ARTIC) or metagenomic
  • Optional: Primer BED file for trimming

Main Outputs

  • Consensus Genomes: Complete SARS-CoV-2 sequences
  • Variant Calls: All mutations with annotations
  • Lineage Reports: Pangolin/Nextclade assignments
  • Mutation Tables: Key variant positions
  • Coverage Metrics: Genome completeness statistics
  • QC Reports: Sample quality assessment
  • GISAID Ready: Formatted for public submission

Perfect for: COVID-19 • SARS-CoV-2 • Viral Surveillance • Outbreak Investigation • Variant Tracking
